scenarios.title: Dealership Account Assistance
scenarios.description: Handle a dealership customer inquiry about account details, confirm their identity, and transfer to the appropriate support team for resolution.
requirements: Strong communication and active listening skills
Ability to verify customer and dealership details
Knowledge of internal support structure and escalation process

questions.question: How would you greet the customer and establish rapport at the start of the call?
What steps would you take to confirm the customer's name and dealership information?
How do you handle cases where the spelling of names or dealership details is unclear?
At what point should you escalate or transfer the call to a specialized support team?
How would you explain the reason for transferring the call to another department?
What best practices ensure a smooth handoff between agents and departments?
How would you close the conversation politely after the transfer is complete?

scenarios.title: Customer Information Verification
scenarios.description: Assist a customer by confirming their identity and dealership details before providing or escalating account-related information.
requirements: Attention to detail when recording customer information
Ability to manage sensitive customer data securely
Clear communication when verifying names and business details

questions.question: How would you politely request the customer to spell their first and last name?
What approach would you take if the customer mishears or misunderstands your spelling confirmation?
How would you verify the dealership name and match it against company records?
What steps ensure that the customer feels reassured during identity verification?
How would you handle situations where dealership details do not match records?
How would you maintain professionalism and patience if the customer becomes frustrated during verification?
What compliance and data protection considerations should you keep in mind during verification?

scenarios.title: Call Transfer and Escalation
scenarios.description: Transfer a customer to the correct department while ensuring a smooth transition and maintaining a positive customer experience.
requirements: Knowledge of support team roles and responsibilities
Ability to communicate transfer reasons clearly
Skill in maintaining customer trust during handoff

questions.question: What are the key signs that a call should be transferred to another department?
How would you explain the need for transfer without making the customer feel dismissed?
What information should you provide to the receiving agent to ensure continuity?
How would you keep the customer engaged while placing them briefly on hold?
What best practices reduce friction during a handoff between departments?
How would you confirm that the customer has been successfully connected to the right person?
How would you close your part of the interaction after transfer, leaving a positive impression?
